scenario.name: call_101_to_102
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:102@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:101@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:102@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:101@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio 6000 RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:102@[remote_ip]:5060 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:101@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:102@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 200 OK Via: [last_Via:] From: [last_From:] To: [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0
